item.description: è½¯ä»¶ç‰ˆæœ¬ openEuler 22.03 openssl-1.1.1w.tar.gz Python-3.9.22.tgz openssl dnf install -y gcc gcc-c++ make perl perl-devel tar zxf openssl-1.1.1w.tar.gz ./config --prefix=/opt/openssl make && make install Python dnf install -y bzip2-devel libffi-devel zlib-devel xz-devel ncurses-devel sqlite-devel readline-devel tk-devel gdbm-devel libnsl2-devel uuid-devel ./configure --prefix=/opt/python-3.9.22 --with-openssl=/opt/openssl --enable-shared --enable-optimizations make && make install
